analysis.description:
OdinToken.transfer (/unique_chucks/4/0xf0cf016ce7504ffa257262cc686f4f7647a65563.sol#157-204) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- msg.sender != owner && block.timestamp < 1553990400 && balances[msg.sender].airDropQty > 0 (/unique_chucks/4/0xf0cf016ce7504ffa257262cc686f4f7647a65563.sol#175-179)
	- msg.sender != owner && block.timestamp < 1535760000 && balances[msg.sender].airDropQty > 0 (/unique_chucks/4/0xf0cf016ce7504ffa257262cc686f4f7647a65563.sol#168-169)
	- msg.sender != owner && block.timestamp < 1561852800 && balances[msg.sender].airDropQty > 0 (/unique_chucks/4/0xf0cf016ce7504ffa257262cc686f4f7647a65563.sol#180-184)
	- msg.sender != owner && block.timestamp < 1546214400 && balances[msg.sender].airDropQty > 0 (/unique_chucks/4/0xf0cf016ce7504ffa257262cc686f4f7647a65563.sol#170-174)
	- msg.sender != owner && block.timestamp < 1569974400 && balances[msg.sender].airDropQty > 0 (/unique_chucks/4/0xf0cf016ce7504ffa257262cc686f4f7647a65563.sol#185-193)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/4/0xf0cf016ce7504ffa257262cc686f4f7647a65563.sol:
	- Usage of "throw" should be replaced with "revert()"

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/4/0xf0cf016ce7504ffa257262cc686f4f7647a65563.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (/unique_chucks/4/0xf0cf016ce7504ffa257262cc686f4f7647a65563.sol#5-7): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/4/0xf0cf016ce7504ffa257262cc686f4f7647a65563.sol#70-71) is not in mixedCase

Owned.newOwner (/unique_chucks/4/0xf0cf016ce7504ffa257262cc686f4f7647a65563.sol#62) is never used in OdinToken
OdinToken.allowed (/unique_chucks/4/0xf0cf016ce7504ffa257262cc686f4f7647a65563.sol#101-102) is never used in OdinToken
